item.description:
***** NEW EVENT ***** Weekend Road Trip from Connecticut to Philly...Only 46 seats on the bus...Boney James, Fred Hammond, Philly Culture & Nightlife, 46 Urban Professionals ready to have a great weekend. Buy your tickets today...this will sell out

Join members of The Urban Professionals Network & BlackinCT.com for the weekend Road Trip of the Summer. We are going to the city of Brotherly Love - Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Boney James / Friday Night. Fred Hammond / Saturday Night

Great City...Great Dining..Great Nightlife...National Historic Landmarks. We are going to have a great weekend.

Single Room - $275 Each
Double Room - $150 Each
Quad Room - $100 Each

This price is All-Inclusive and includes One Night Hotel, Round Trip Transportation, Breakfast, Both Concerts, and Taxes/Fees


Pay for your tickets online at www.theupn.org/jazzgospel

Or call Jason at 203.444.2509.....

This will sell out only 46 Seats available.
item.name: BlackinCT.com presents The Jazz & Gospel Getaway (Boney James/Fred Hammond)
